string.text: Spits and sizzles pour out like a sprinkler
You see something explode into a bloody mess
Why can i hear voices in my head...
Your presence alone angers this spectural being
Distant and static, whispers rattle your eardrums
Whispers in tongues echo between the bone of your skull
Strikes of lighting and heavy rain pour down
Steam slowly seeps out from cracks in the concrete
Gusts of steam, blast out of the walls
Tustles of energy can be heard converging and condensing
A large coil of energy zips past you
You can hear the pulsating rythmns of a gravi nearby
You can hear hum of a whirligig nearby
A fruit punch anomaly bubbles idly
A constant droning of electricity can be heard
Crackles and singes of heat raise of the ground
A large ball of fire drifts by
You hear a vortex rumble close by
Intoxicating, it beckons you closer
You hit a gravi
You hit a Whirligig
You feel a burning sensation of your neck and arms
Flesh turns to mush as the acid devours the skin
Something is zapped with thousands of amperes, melting flesh and boiling blood from the inside out
Your clothes set alight, scorhing your skin
As if stuck in quicksand, your feet are dragged into the ground
A gravi has been triggered nearby
The cluster of electra jolt in excitement
The air picks up, you can feel it's intensity, the sky sends out waves of energy
You see something be trapped in a cloud of dust and thrown into the air
You inhale heavy specks of brown plant fibre
A sudden ball of electric appears above you, quickly flashing and disappearing soon after
The burner jumps to life, creating a column of fire
